00015 #include <QApplication>
00016 #include <QDebug>

00020 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
00021 {
00022     Q_INIT_RESOURCE(kactus);
00023     QApplication a(argc, argv);
00024 
00025     // Set the palette to use nice pastel colors.
00026     QPalette palette = a.palette();
00027     palette.setColor(QPalette::Active, QPalette::Highlight, QColor(33, 135, 237));
00028     palette.setColor(QPalette::Disabled, QPalette::Highlight, QColor(166, 200, 234));
00029     palette.setColor(QPalette::Inactive, QPalette::Highlight, QColor(166, 200, 234));
00030     a.setPalette(palette);
00031 
00032     // Show the splash screen.
00033     SplashScreen splash;
00034     splash.show();
00035     splash.showMessage("");
00036     a.processEvents();
00037 
00038     // Create the main window and close the splash after 1.5 seconds.
00039     MainWindow w;
00040     QTimer::singleShot(1500, &splash, SLOT(close()));
00041     QTimer::singleShot(1500, &w, SLOT(show()));
00042         return a.exec();
00043 }
